osyfe.graphic.util

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.util.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Geometry.D2, Geometry.D3

    public abstract class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates and transform some basic geometries.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Geometry.D2
      Two dimensional structures.
      static class  Geometry.D3
      Three dimensional structures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Geometry.D2 circle(int edges)
      A unit circle, centered by (0, 0).
      static Geometry.D3 cube()
      A cube with unit width, centered by (0, 0, 0).
      static Geometry.D3 cylinder(int edges)
      A prisma with unit outer radius and unit height, centered by (0, 0, 0).
      abstract void feed(Mesh mesh)
      Feeds this data into the given mesh using Shader.POSITION.
      static Geometry.D2 rectangle()
      A square with unit width, centered by (0, 0).
      static Geometry.D3 sphereRings(int rings)
      A unit sphere, centered by (0, 0, 0).
      static Geometry.D3 sphereTetrahedron(int level)
      A unit sphere contained by starting with a tetrahedron an subdividing each triangle into 4 triangles 'level' times.

        public static Geometry.D3 sphereRings(int rings)
        A unit sphere, centered by (0, 0, 0). 'rings' many slices of vertices will be generated.

      • sphereTetrahedron

        public static Geometry.D3 sphereTetrahedron(int level)
        A unit sphere contained by starting with a tetrahedron an subdividing each triangle into 4 triangles 'level' times.
